General.Name: COFCO Engineering & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: COFCO Technology & Industry Co., Ltd., a scientific and technological company, operates as an agricultural food engineering technology service provider and grain machine products supplier. The company engages in the consultation and design business, including engineering design and engineering consulting in the field of agricultural and food product processing engineering; and agricultural and food product processing engineering technology services, including project consulting, engineering design, technical equipment research and development, equipment manufacturing, equipment sets and supply, equipment installation, and related general contracting. It is also involved in the research, development, and manufacture of agricultural and food processing engineering products, such as dryers, flour post-processing equipment, milling machines, square screens, powder cleaners, extractors, oil presses, extruders, cans, and other related products. In addition, the company's business covers public building design, project supervision, research development and application, biomedical engineering, oil storage and transport, inspection and testing, and magazine publishing. Further, it engages in biochemical processing, meat breeding, and slaughtering processing. Its services and solutions cover grain storage, cold chain, grain warehouse logistics, public building design, and special refrigeration, as well as wheat, rice, oil, flour, grain, feed, and food processing. The company was formerly known as COFCO Engineering & Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to COFCO Technology & Industry Co., Ltd. in September 2022. COFCO Technology & Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Wuxi, China.

1.Name: Mr. Yufeng  Duan
1.Title: Director, CFO & Sec. of the Board of Directors
